name: Ethiopian Sidamo
summary: Delightful blueberry notes with a bright acidity.

vendors.name: Stumptown Coffee Roasters
vendors.description: Stumptown Coffee Roasters is a specialty coffee roaster and retailer known for its direct trade practices and commitment to quality. They offer a variety of single-origin coffees from around the world.

vendors.name: Monmouth Coffee Company
vendors.description: Monmouth Coffee Company is a renowned coffee roaster and retailer based in London. They source high-quality beans from around the world and roast them to perfection, offering a range of specialty coffees.

name: Colombian Supremo
summary: Rich chocolate flavor with hints of nut and caramel.

vendors.name: Juan Valdez Café
vendors.description: Juan Valdez Café is a Colombian coffeehouse chain known for promoting Colombian coffee worldwide. They offer a variety of Colombian coffee beans, including the renowned Colombian Supremo.

vendors.name: Blue Bottle Coffee
vendors.description: Blue Bottle Coffee is a specialty coffee roaster and retailer headquartered in Oakland, California. They are committed to sourcing and roasting the finest quality coffee beans from around the world.

name: Brazilian Santos
summary: Smooth with a balance of chocolate and spice.

vendors.name: Café do Mercado
vendors.address: Rua da Cantareira, 306 - Sé, São Paulo - SP, 01024-000
vendors.description: Café do Mercado is a coffeehouse located in São Paulo's Mercado Municipal, offering a wide selection of Brazilian coffee beans. They are known for their commitment to quality and sustainability.

vendors.name: Intelligentsia Coffee
vendors.description: Intelligentsia Coffee is a specialty coffee roaster and retailer with locations across the United States. They are dedicated to sourcing, roasting, and serving the finest coffees from around the world.

name: Costa Rican Tarrazú
summary: Love the bright acidity and honey sweetness. A delightful cup!

vendors.name: Starbucks
vendors.description: Starbucks is a multinational coffeehouse chain known for its wide range of coffee beverages. They source beans from various regions and offer a diverse menu to cater to different tastes.

vendors.name: Origo
vendors.description: Origo is a specialty coffee shop located in the heart of Bucharest. They are passionate about offering high-quality coffee beans from around the world and providing exceptional coffee experiences.
